activities: As an international outcomes research organisation, we collect information from patients, caregivers and healthcare professionals in various locations. The data collected is analysed and reported in a single location, which will sometimes be our US office. We also collect information on our employees, potential recruits and clients, including those based in the EU, and that information is sometimes shared with our US office.
contactoff1: Mapi Values USA LLC trading as Adelphi Values
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We process personal data from outcomes research subjects, employees, job applicants and clients. Some of the data will be managed manually.
